about_the_game:
Craft your perfect loadout with our innovative Loadout System, allowing you to tailor your gear to your exact specifications for maximum tactical advantage.


Experience an array of exhilarating game modes, from intense Search & Destroy missions to adrenaline-fueled Team Deathmatches and the cutthroat chaos of Free For All battles.


Stand out on the battlefield with personalized Player Banners (Callsigns), showcasing your unique style and identity as you rise through the ranks to become a true legend of war.


Forge alliances with friends and allies, form powerful clans, and coordinate your strategies to dominate every corner of the battlefield, leaving your mark on the annals of warfare.


Embark on epic campaigns across a vast array of breathtaking maps, ranging from claustrophobic urban environments to sprawling, open landscapes, each offering its own unique challenges and opportunities for triumph.


Feel the pulse-pounding adrenaline rush of combat as you dive headfirst into the heart of the conflict, surrounded by the thunderous roar of gunfire and the explosive symphony of war.


Immerse yourself in the Sounds of War and experience thrilling battles that will put your skills to the test. Join the community, compete against players from all over the world, and prove that you are the ultimate warrior. What are you waiting for? The battle awaits – gear up for Sounds of War on Steam!

content_descriptors.notes: This game may contain content that is not suitable for all age groups or for viewing in professional environments: It frequently depicts violence, blood, or mutilation, as well as general mature themes and content. Viewer discretion is advised.

name: Sounds of War

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 or higher
  • Processor: 4 Hardware-CPU-Threads – Intel® Core™ i5 3. GEN or higher
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 or AMD Radeon HD 5870 (DirectX-11 compliant with 1GB of VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K @ 3.3 GHz or better or AMD FX-8120 @ 3.1 Ghz or better
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650 or AMD Radeon HD 7970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 MB available space

short_description: Experience the action! Sounds of War delivers intense 5v5 battles across modes like Capture The Flag and Free for All. Customize weapons, rank up, and become the ultimate warrior. Join a clan, challenge friends, and dominate the battlefield. Warfare redefined!
